title: Bpete804757
author: Bpete804757
content: i have a rumexbit with .32 btc in it. the acct isnt active yet, deposit was from promo code. ive hit some hard times and have no funds... if it can be verified, if u help me with a .0065 deposit of btc or another crypto i will pay generously!!!! need the help my daughters mom died recently and i hit some hardships due to some mental issues ive been trying to overcome. reply to peterson891601@gmail.com or 8286201425.ty

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: Bpete804757 on August 30, 2023, 04:38:21 AMi have a rumexbit with .32 btc in it. the acct isnt active yet, deposit was from promo code. ive hit some hard times and have no funds... if it can be verified, if u help me with a .0065 deposit of btc or another crypto i will pay generously!!!! need the help my daughters mom died recently and i hit some hardships due to some mental issues ive been trying to overcome. reply to peterson891601@gmail.com or 8286201425.tyI don't want to discourage you but no one on this forum will deposit 0.0065 BTC for someone whom they don't know and you're also not a ranked member of the forum.Â  If you really got .32 BTC then you should be alert that there can be some wager requirements as well and I have never heard about rumexbit and that's why I recommend you to be careful from such sites. Even if you get some money you should be careful when depositing it on their site because they can run away with your money. I don't think that any promo code would make someone .32 BTC without any effort, and that's why I recommend you to be careful.I also doubt that you can be among those scammers who come with such posts only to test the empathy of the forum members, and if you're one of those scammers then you should also keep in mind that members of this forum aren't naive enough to send money to someone they don't know personally. Many people have came with similar stories many times on this forum and because of those people we got a lesson that trusting new members is very risky and I'm sure no one is going to take those risks.
